abilities.name: Dark Ray
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Umbreon * from your hand onto your Bench, you may choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké
